description: Try our easy to follow Poached Peaches recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Poached fruit,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Stone fruit,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Poached Peaches Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place 6 peaches in a large pan of boiling water for about 1 minute or until the skin splits. Remove with a slotted spoon and refresh in a large bowl of iced water.
Use a small knife to peel away the skin and cut each in half following the natural seam. Twist to separate and remove the stones. Cut each half in half.
Stir 2 cups water, 1 cup caster sugar, finely shredded rind of 1 orange and a good pinch of saffron in a saucepan over low heat until sugar dissolves. Increase heat to high and bring to the boil.
Reduce heat and simmer, uncovered for 10 minutes or until thickened and syrupy. Cool for 10 minutes.
Place peaches into a clear, sterilised, sealable jar or container and pour over the syrup. Seal and keep refrigerated for 2 weeks.
